title: Grateful Dead Live at Berkeley Community Theatre on 1972-08-22
lineage: Set 1: Master Dat (Sony R500) -> Behringer UltraMatch SRC 2000 -> SEK'D Prodif Plus -> Samplitude v7.02 Professional -> Cool Edit Pro v2.0 -> SHN. Set 2 : CD -> EAC -> Samplitude v7.02 Professional -> SHN
source: Set 1 : SBD -> Master Reel (10 inch Master Reels @ 7.5ips 1/2trk) -> Apogee AD500 -> Master Dat (Panasonic SV3800/48k).  Set 2 : SBD -> Master Reel (10 inch Master Reels @ 7.5ips 1/2trk) -> PCM -> Dat -> CD
